"},{"text":"XP Storage","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"In addition to items, ender chests can hold experience levels. Standing on an ender chest deposits XP, while standing below withdraws it."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.xp_storage.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Experience orbs stored in ender chests cannot be transfered to tools with mending; it is a direct transfer."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.xp_storage.2"}]}]
